inclusion.criterion: Patients must have recurrent GBM (Glioblastoma Multiforme)or Anaplastic Astrocytoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The diagnosis of GBM or Anaplastic Astrocytoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have been previously treated with surgical resection (any extent okay)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: and adjuvant radiation therapy plus temozolomide.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be at least 12 months from completion of radiation therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 2 months from completion of temozolomide (to be consistent with the the
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status <2 (Karnofsky >60%, see appendix A).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: There must be measurable disease on MRI.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Must be able to receive an MRI

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not be receiving any other investigational cancer treatment agents at the time of enrollment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients may not have previously failed treatment with salvage temozolomide.
